message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is worth over $100 to me. Considering its quality and unique features, I would like to propose a starting price of $85. I'm open to negotiation, so please let me know if this is within your budget or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality of your product, $85 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now. I'm willing to offer $70 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your offer. After considering the value of the product and your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to counteroffer at $75 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable or if you would like to make another counteroffer.
